name: Oumph and Teriyaki
instructions: Chop the vegetables. Mix the soy sauce, grated garlic and hunny, to create a home made Teriyaki. Cut the lime in 4 pieces. Fry the vegetables till they are nearly done. Then add the Ouph, lime  and Teriyaki let simmer under lid for about 5min, whilst cooking the pasta. Dish up the meal and garnish with coriander.
instructions-extended: * Can be substituted with soy meat.
